products.title: Anker Prime Charging Docking Station | 14-in-1 Dual Display, 160W Fast Charging Hub

Equipped with a total charging capacity of 160W, the station charges up to four devices simultaneously, with USB-C ports delivering up to 100W per single output and a USB-A port providing up to 12W. The real-time smart display offers updates on charging status and device connections, ensuring optimal control. Its advanced thermal design and temperature regulation keep devices safe during operation.   2. Dual 4K Display Support: Connect to two 4K displays simultaneously with a smooth 60Hz refresh rate for an elevated visual experience.
  3. High-Speed Charging: Delivers a total output of 160W, charging up to four devices simultaneously. USB-C ports offer up to 100W each for rapid charging, while a USB-A port provides 12W.
  4. Fast Data Transfer: USB-C 3.1 Gen 2 ensures blazing-fast file transfer speeds of up to 10Gbps for seamless data management.
  5. Smart Display Integration: Provides real-time visual feedback on battery levels, connection statuses, and other critical information.
  6. Advanced Safety Features: Optimized heat dissipation and precise temperature control ensure safety and reliable performance.

products.title: HyperX QuadCast 2 S - Advanced USB Microphone with Customizable aRGB Lighting and Superior Audio Quality
products.body_html:

products.title: HyperX Alloy Rise 75 - Ultra-Customizable 75% Mechanical Gaming Keyboard with Red Switch
products.body_html:
The HyperX Alloy Rise is a groundbreaking mechanical gaming keyboard engineered for enthusiasts seeking unmatched customization and performance. Featuring toolless hot-swappable key switches, magnetic top plates, and personalized badges, this keyboard lets you create a setup as unique as your playstyle. Built on a sturdy gasket-mounted frame, the Alloy Rise combines durability and comfort with its factory-lubed HyperX Linear Switches, designed for smooth actuation and rated for up to 80 million keypresses.

Take your gaming to the next level with innovative features like the world’s first ambient light sensor, dynamically adjusting RGB brightness to match your environment. Store up to 10 keyboard profiles directly on the device, enabling seamless transitions between lighting and macro configurations for any scenario. Whether you're gaming or streaming, dedicated media controls and an ultra-responsive 8000Hz polling rate provide precision and convenience.

  • Ambient Light Sensor: Automatically adjusts RGB brightness to match your surroundings.

  • Provides enhanced typing comfort and reduces noise during intense sessions.

  • Integrated media buttons and a rotary knob allow seamless control of your entertainment.

  • Simplifies cable management and ensures easy portability.

    Designed specifically for younger gamers, the headset is lightweight and equipped with soft memory foam and leatherette ear cushions for extended wear.

products.title: Hollyland Lark M2S Combo - Ultra-Light Wireless Microphone with 30 Hours Battery Life, Superior Noise Cancellation & 300m Range
products.body_html:
The Hollyland Lark M2S Combo is the ultimate solution for content creators seeking a wireless microphone system that combines exceptional performance with portability. Weighing just 7 grams, the Lark M2S is one of the lightest wireless microphones in the industry, providing ultimate comfort without sacrificing sound quality. With an impressive 300m (1,000ft) transmission range, you can experience superior sound capture even in open and unobstructed environments. The system ensures crisp, high-fidelity audio with a 48 kHz sample rate and 24-bit depth, making it the ideal companion for live streams, interviews, vlogs, and more.

Designed for ease of use, the Lark M2S Combo is universally compatible, featuring both analog (3.5mm) and digital (USB-C) outputs. This makes it adaptable to a wide range of devices, including cameras, smartphones, tablets, and computers, offering a seamless connection for all your creative needs. The system also includes a charging case, providing 30 hours of battery life, with the flexibility to recharge your devices on the go. Whether you are recording outdoors, at events, or while moving, the Lark M2S offers powerful noise cancellation and stable audio capture, ensuring your voice is heard clearly at all times.

Key Features:

  • Ultra-Light Design: The Lark M2S transmitter weighs only 7 grams, making it the lightest in its category, ensuring long-lasting comfort even for extended use.
  • High-Fidelity Audio: With a 48 kHz sample rate and 24-bit depth, this microphone captures crystal-clear, balanced audio perfect for any recording scenario.
  • 300m Transmission Range: Enjoy a long-range, interference-free signal transmission of up to 300m (1,000ft), ensuring consistent audio capture even in large open spaces.
  • Superior Noise Cancellation: Featuring dual-level noise cancellation (strong and weak), the system allows you to adapt to different environments, keeping your audio clear and undisturbed.
  • Compact and Discreet Design: The tiny, hidden mic design allows you to discreetly capture sound without drawing attention, perfect for live streams, vlogs, and interviews.
  • Titanium Clip for Stability: A titanium clip ensures that the microphone stays securely attached even during movement, preventing slipping or shifting while recording.
  • 30 Hours Battery Life: With a charging case included, the combo version provides up to 30 hours of operational time, ideal for long shoots or events.
  • Universally Compatible: The Lark M2S Combo works with a variety of devices, including iOS and Android smartphones, tablets, cameras, and computers, ensuring it meets all your recording needs.

Specifications:

  • Mic Sensitivity: -37 dBV ± 2dB @ 1 KHz, 94dB SPL
  • Wireless Modulation Mode: GFSK 2 Mbps
  • Wireless Transmission: 2.4 GHz Adaptive Frequency Hopping (AFH)
  • Transmission Range: Mobile Version: Up to 300m (1,000ft) for LOS / 60m (200ft) for NLOS

Conclusion:
The Hollyland Lark M2S Combo is a powerful and versatile microphone system that is perfectly suited for creators who demand both portability and top-tier performance. With features such as high-fidelity audio, dual-level noise cancellation, and an impressive 300m range, it is an invaluable tool for content creators, videographers, and professionals. Its lightweight design, extended battery life, and universal compatibility ensure that you can record anywhere, anytime, without worrying about performance or connectivity issues. Whether you're a seasoned professional or an aspiring creator, the Lark M2S Combo is the ideal solution for capturing pristine audio effortlessly.
